::Rodimus Prime/Kup::

Rodimus: We wait for the briefing and figure out a way to deal with this Decepticon on top of the Predacons and Unicron problems we already had. I'm most interested to hear the news Kup brings from Cybertron.

Kup: You won't really like it, lad. Nightlight and Windlord heard a bit on the flight here. It's best that I go into full detail once with everyone.
